mapper.select: select board_no,subject,wdate,writer,lev from board where lev = 'S' and type = '상품' order by ref desc

select board_no,writer,subject,wdate,itemPicture,itemTitle,itemNo,indent,lev,content from ( select b.board_no board_no,b.writer writer,b.subject subject,to_char(b.wdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') wdate,i.itemNo itemno, i.image itemPicture,i.title itemTitle, b.indent indent,b.lev lev,b.content content, rownum r from board b left outer join item i on i.itemno = b.itemno where
b.subject like '%'||#{word}||'%' and b.lev = 'A' and b.type = '상품'
b.content like '%'||#{word}||'%' and b.lev = 'A' and b.type = '상품'
b.writer like '%'||#{word}||'%' and b.lev = 'A' and b.type = '상품'
b.lev = 'A' and b.type = '상품'
order by ref desc,board_no asc ) where
r >=#{sno} and r<=#{eno}

select count(*) from board
subject like '%'||#{word}||'%' and lev = 'A' and type = '상품'
content like '%'||#{word}||'%' and lev = 'A' and type = '상품'
writer like '%'||#{word}||'%' and lev = 'A' and type = '상품'
lev = 'A' and type = '상품'
select name from member where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(board_no, id, content,itemNo,wdate,ref,writer,subject,check_read,lev,category,type) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(board_no), 0) + 1 as board_no FROM board), #{id},#{content},#{itemno},sysdate,(SELECT NVL(MAX(ref), 0) + 1 FROM board),#{writer},#{subject},#{check_read},#{lev},#{category},#{type})
